solution_line_template: The total cost of The Life Journey is {num_each_cd} × ${price_life_journey} = $<<{num_each_cd}*{price_life_journey}={total_life_journey}>>{total_life_journey}.
The total cost of When You Rescind is {num_each_cd} × ${price_rescind} = $<<{num_each_cd}*{price_rescind}={total_rescind}>>{total_rescind}.
The total cost of A Day a Life is {num_each_cd} × ${price_day_life} = $<<{num_each_cd}*{price_day_life}={total_day_life}>>{total_day_life}.
The total cost for all the CDs is ${total_day_life} + ${total_rescind} + ${total_life_journey} = $<<{total_day_life}+{total_rescind}+{total_life_journey}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
